title: Valkyrie Movie Title Font
content:
Yves and Stephen have been wonderful over at [The FontFeed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117230242/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/screenfonts-january-2009/) helping to id the type used in Valkyrie, but i would like to know if the title type is a font or lettering.

You can see the first 6 mins over at Apple:

[http://www.apple.com/trailers/mgm/valkyrie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117230242/http:/www.apple.com/trailers/mgm/valkyrie/ "http://www.apple.com/trailers/mgm/valkyrie/")

If anyone has seen the movie and can remember what the type used for the ending credits was, i would love to know. i can't find a vid/pic of it online.

thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [valkyrie1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117230242/http:/typophile.com/files/valkyrie1.jpg) | 54.35 KB |
| [valkyrie2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117230242/http:/typophile.com/files/valkyrie2.jpg) | 48.08 KB |
author: Sye

comments.content:
My money is on lettering.

IIRC, the ending credits were in Trebuchet – very lame. (But maybe I’m messing this up with another movie.)

yeah, yves thought lettering too.

trebuchet? really? for some reason i thought it was soemthing more elegant than that.

hmmmm
